name: FindHousesByHumans
documentation: Satisfied if given human gets inside the given radius around the given house.

parameters.name: HumanId
parameters.documentation: The ObjectId of the human that needs to approach the house.

parameters.name: HouseId
parameters.documentation: The ObjectId of the house the human needs to approach.

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.documentation: The radius around the house the human has to be in to satisfy the goal.
